name: CodeInside
description:
About us
We are agile high technology company based in Russia in the middle of Central IT Hub area.We are in software development business for 6 years. We are good at fast development of high performance and scalable software. Our main target is complex B2B web systems.
Core competencies
Our core competencies are in Enterprise software development (JEE) and Embedded systems development (C++ / C) domains.
Domain areas
Finance: Electronic Payment systems, eWallets, Payment terminals,Credit companies, Blockchain and Bitcoin
Enterprise corporate systems development: Business processes automation, Web services integration
Internet of things and embedded systems
Technology stack
JEE/JSE Platform, Cryptography, BPMN, C/C++ for embedded software
Programming languages: Java, JavaScript, Ruby;
Markup languages: html, css, xml, json, yaml
Backend frameworks: Spring Platform, Play framework, Vaadin, Grails framework, Eclipse Platform, Activiti, EclipseLink, Hibernate, MyBatis, JMS, OSGI, Web Service (wsdl, xsd), Taskurotta, AngularJS, Lift framework, RoR;
Integration systems Alfresco и ServiceMix;
Encryption, Electronic signatures;
Source control systems: Git, SVN;
Quality control: Selenium, WebDriver, HtmlUnit, Jmeter, Hudson 
Build tools: Maven, ivy, ant, gradle
Databases: PostgreSQL, Oracle, H2
IDEs: IntelliJ IDEA, Eclipse
Operation systems: Debian, Ubuntu, Alt Linux, Windows.
Project management systems: Assembla, Jira, Redmine, Asana, Youtrack.
